content: When you view recent topics window (t on web app), certain topics are underlined. Is there a reason behind that? I couldn't find a pattern :grinning:
That is the cursor I think. You can move up and down with the arrow keys.
And open the selected topic using enter.
ah yes :stuck_out_tongue:
it just sets it on a random one which made not think of that :grinning:
How do you close that window without clicking the underlined entry?
You can click on "All messages" in the top left corner.
But that doesn't bring you back to the stream you were in

The "Recent topics" view is not a window on top of individual streams. Rather it is the opposite. Individual streams are "windows" on top of "All messages" or "Recent topics". As such esc brings you back to either "All messages" or "Recent topics".
Yeah, you're right, Back does the trick :)
esc doesn't work in recent tabs though at least for me
